conclusion: Analyze forces to determine frictional force exerted by the ground on the board.
Wooden block P of mass m slides on a long wooden board ab of mass M.
Coefficient of kinetic friction between board and ground is μ1, and between block and board is μ2.
Board ab is placed on a horizontal ground and remains stationary.
Gravitational force on block P is mg.
Normal force N1 on block P is mg.
Kinetic frictional force f1 on block P is μ2mg.
Gravitational force on board ab is Mg.
Normal force N2 on board ab is (M + m)g.
Kinetic frictional force f2 on board ab is μ2mg.
Frictional force f3 by ground on board ab needs to be determined.
Net force on board ab is zero since it remains stationary.
Frictional force f3 must balance frictional force f2.
Frictional force f3 is equal to μ2mg.
Magnitude of frictional force by ground on board ab is μ2mg.
